description: Fàula is the restaurant at the Casa Langa hotel, a large property which opens out like an amphitheatre to offer panoramic views of the valley. Here, the young chef skilfully creates cuisine which blends the culinary traditions of the Piedmont with more modern dishes. A good selection of wines from the region, plus a biodynamic kitchen garden add to the appeal.
